item.description:
Get ready for a great night of fun, food, and games! Ladies wear your most outrageous PJ's and slippers! Also bring your favorites oldies but goodies CD's!

Geri is gracious to host and to allow all of us crazy women in her house!

This is a night to forgo dieting. You are each asked to bring one Nostalgic food item on the following list. When you reserve, please put in the comment box what food you are bringing so it won't be repeated (except for Pizza)!

NOSTALGIC FOOD LIST:

Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwiches on Wonder Bread

Fluffernutters and Peanut Butter on Wonder Bread

Brownies

S'Mores

Ice Cream Sundae Bars

Macaroni and Cheese

Pizza, Pizza, and more Pizza!

Old Fashioned Candies: Snickers, Good n Plenty, Milky Way, Sugar Daddies

Twinkies

Hostess Cupcakes

Homemade Cupcakes

Chips and Dip

Popcorn

Cracker Jacks

Tuna Casserole

Fried Chicken

Root Beer Floats

Cherry Coke, Coke, Rootbeer, Gingerale, Orange Soda, etc.

Geri is providing a 5ft. long Sub!

Note: For those that "Drink Alcohol" it is BYOB!

GAMES to Look Forward To:

No Mirror Makeover: Please bring "Makeup."
Truth or Dare or I Have Never
Guess Who?
Getting To Know You
Pajama Pageant - Prizes for Sexiest, Most Creative, Most Elegant
Chick Flick Drinking Game
TP Designer
Clothing Swap
Twister

Also, Geri's is offering us ladies the option of including a "Clothing Swap" too! Bring dresses, coats, shoes, jewelry, slacks, blouses - that you no longer wear - and we will just swap.

Note: When you get to Geri's High Tech, High Security apartment complex, "Ring" the buzzer for APT. #203 located in the foyer, and she'll allow us crazy women to enter!

Note: Geri has a small dog, but he won't be home that night for those who have allergies!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: BYOB Nostalgic Pajama Party at Geri's House! NOTE: Time Change
